display_long_description:
**DETECTIVE VR is a narrative investigation in Mixed-Reality** : You can control time, collect clues and interview witnesses in Passthrough.

 The investigation takes place in your living room. Explore unreliable testimonies and confront suspects to find out what happened ! 

[media]



DETECTIVE VR is designed for **Hand Tracking**



A mix between ObraDinn/Immortality and Minority report, **an innovative way to tell a story in Mixed Reality.**

[media]



**Features**
- 5 hours of story-driven gameplay

- 1 story /  6 characters / 11 sequences to explore
- Timecontrol : You can rewind, pause and play the scenes to find the hidden clue in the timeline.
- Full hand tracking support (for the best immersive experience, we recommend playing this way)





More info and behind the scenes footage :
www.detective-vr.com

Developed by Studio Chipo y Juan & Valem Studio 

[media]

[media]




[media]


[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
